page.title: 19Public Houses
page.content: The pub that I live in is called "The Tipton Arms". It is a very big pub, in fact it is the biggest in Tipton. The pub has a lounge, function room,games room and a bar.The bar is the busiest room; it has the cheapest prices. The games room is the busiest at the week end.You can play pool, cards, dominoes and darts in the games room. In summer we have discos in the games room. We have wedding and engagement parties in the function room. Behind the pub there is a garden. Normally in the garden people sit around and have a drink, but this summer (1985) we are having an August Festival with a football tournament, a barbeque, the Highgate Brewery Band and a disco.
